title: Awesome List Updates on May 29, 2023
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on May 29, 2023 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Free for Dev
items.content_text:
### Web Hosting

*   [Serv00.com](https://serv00.com/) — 3 GB of free web hosting with daily backups (7 days). Support: Crontab jobs, SSH access, repositories (GIT, SVN, and Mercurial), support: MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, PHP, Node.js, Python, Ruby, Java, Perl, TCL/TK, Lua, Erlang, Rust, Pascal, C, C++, D, R, and many more.
items.content_html:
Web Hosting

  • Serv00.com — 3 GB of free web hosting with daily backups (7 days). Support: Crontab jobs, SSH access, repositories (GIT, SVN, and Mercurial), support: MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, PHP, Node.js, Python, Ruby, Java, Perl, TCL/TK, Lua, Erlang, Rust, Pascal, C, C++, D, R, and many more.

items.title: Awesome Zsh Plugins
items.content_text:
### Plugins / [superconsole](https://github.com/alexchmykhalo/superconsole) - Windows-only

*   [coffee-time (⭐2)](https://github.com/gakimball/zsh-coffee-time) - Adds the `caf` alias, which runs `caffeinate -dims`. The extra flags keep everything awake: the system, the drive, and the display.
*   [gpt (⭐20)](https://github.com/antonjs/zsh-gpt) - Enable querying ChatGPT from the command line.
*   [macos-theme (⭐0)](https://github.com/gakimball/zsh-macos-theme) - Adds the theme command, which toggles between light and dark mode in macOS. Requires [lux (⭐35)](https://github.com/pndurette/zsh-lux) plugin.
items.content_html:
Plugins / superconsole - Windows-only

  • coffee-time (⭐2) - Adds the caf alias, which runs caffeinate -dims. The extra flags keep everything awake: the system, the drive, and the display.
  • gpt (⭐20) - Enable querying ChatGPT from the command line.
  • macos-theme (⭐0) - Adds the theme command, which toggles between light and dark mode in macOS. Requires lux (⭐35) plugin.

items.title: Awesome Zig
items.content_text:
### Network / HTTP

*   [zigzap/zap (⭐2.9k)](https://github.com/zigzap/zap) - blazingly fast, robust HTTP server.
items.content_html:
Network / HTTP

  • zigzap/zap (⭐2.9k) - blazingly fast, robust HTTP server.

items.title: Awesome Generative Deep Art
items.content_text:
### Creative Uses of Generative AI Image Synthesis Tools / Deforum

*   [Wilco Sierra](https://trywilco.com/sierra): A platform that generates engineering challenges for software engineers using GPT.

items.title: Awesome Neovim
items.content_text:
### Color / Diagnostics

*   [echasnovski/mini.nvim#mini.hipatterns (⭐7.5k)](https://github.com/echasnovski/mini.nvim/blob/main/readmes/mini-hipatterns.md) - Module of `mini.nvim` to highlight patterns in text with configurable highlighters. Works asynchronously with configurable debounce delay.
items.content_html:
Color / Diagnostics

  • echasnovski/mini.nvim#mini.hipatterns (⭐7.5k) - Module of mini.nvim to highlight patterns in text with configurable highlighters. Works asynchronously with configurable debounce delay.

items.title: Awesome Appimage
items.content_text:
### AppImage consumption tools / Desktop integration

*   [Gear lever (⭐973)](https://github.com/mijorus/gearlever/) - Integrates AppImages into the Gnome desktop by drag-and-drop onto the Gear lever application.

### AppImage developer tools / Tools to convert from other package formats

*   [AppImaGen (⭐24)](https://github.com/ivan-hc/AppImaGen) - Generates an AppImage from Debian or from a PPA of your choice for the previous (unfortunately not the oldest as recommended) and still supported Ubuntu LTS.
items.content_html:
AppImage consumption tools / Desktop integration

  • Gear lever (⭐973) - Integrates AppImages into the Gnome desktop by drag-and-drop onto the Gear lever application.

AppImage developer tools / Tools to convert from other package formats

  • AppImaGen (⭐24) - Generates an AppImage from Debian or from a PPA of your choice for the previous (unfortunately not the oldest as recommended) and still supported Ubuntu LTS.

items.title: Awesome Shell
items.content_text:
### Command-Line Productivity

*   [broot (⭐12k)](https://github.com/Canop/broot) - A better way to navigate directories
*   [tere (⭐1.8k)](https://github.com/mgunyho/tere) - A faster alternative to cd + ls

### Customization / Directory Navigation

*   [polyglot (⭐188)](https://github.com/agkozak/polyglot) - An informative Git prompt that works in bash, zsh, ksh, mksh, pdksh, oksh, dash, yash, busybox sh, and osh
items.content_html:
Command-Line Productivity

  • broot (⭐12k) - A better way to navigate directories
  • tere (⭐1.8k) - A faster alternative to cd + ls

Customization / Directory Navigation

  • polyglot (⭐188) - An informative Git prompt that works in bash, zsh, ksh, mksh, pdksh, oksh, dash, yash, busybox sh, and osh
